question: You saw an advert in the newspaper asking for volunteers to help run a charity event. Write a letter of application to the organizers. In your letter:-explain why you are interested in helping-Give details suitable past experience-suggest ways you might help with the event.
text: I writing with regards to the advert that I saw, "Volunteering camp in the Charles Elders home", in the Sunday Observer, 24th September 2022.

I am interested in participating in the event of helping grandparents at Charles Elders' home. Over the years I have been an active member of  Lion's club, especially during events like these. In addition to that, I love working with adults since it gives me a lot of pleasure.

Let me provide you with some details of my experience working with adults. As I mentioned above, I have been an active member of  Lion's club for 10 years now, I have enough experience doing similar projects with them. On top of that, I have my grandmother at home, so, I know how to work with them, and I have a good understanding of their feelings.

Finally, I am good at cooking  and giving baths to the elders. Last and not least, I am good at singing, I can sing songs from the 70s, my grandparents love those very much. I hope these skills will be useful to the event.
If you need more information, please contact me on my mobile, and I look forward to hearing from you.
